price: الله غواړي چې له تاسو نه (بنديزونه) سپك كړي او انسان خو پيدا شوى دى كمزورى.
arabic: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمۡۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ ضَعِيفٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: yurīdu al-lahu an yukhaffifa ʿankum wakhuliqa al-insānu ḍaʿīfan
